hadiths.text: Aishah said:The people (mostly) were workers and they would come for Friday prayer in the same condition, so it was said to them: If only you were to perform Ghusl

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي تَرْكِ الْغُسْلِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Permissibility Of Not Performing Ghusl On Friday
